option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: wix build -ext WixToolset.UI.wixext -bindvariable WixUILicenseRtf=EULA.rtf msi.wxs -out build\Pixed.Installer.msi

option.name: INTERPRETER_OPTIONS
option.value: wix build -ext WixToolset.UI.wixext -bindvariable WixUILicenseRtf=EULA.rtf msi.wxs -out build\Pixed.Installer.msi
